name: DarkCrafters
description:
A very rough prototype of a simultaneous turn based combat system made for JamCraft 3. I hope to continue iterating on this as I think there is potential for something pretty neat here.

Objective:

  • Craft your turn with up to 3 sequences that will execute simultaneously with your opponent. Try to hit your opponent (blue) with a punch or fireball

Moves:

  • Defend - Increase your health by 1
  • Move - Move 1 tile in the selected direction and punch when near your opponent
  • Charge - Use to cast a fire ball (up to 3 charges)
  • Fireball - Click the tile you want to cast to (requires a charge)
  • Punch = 1 dmg
  • Fireball = 5 dmg

Dev notes:

  • There Will Be Bugs.
  • There isn't any progression here really, just the basic mechanics and a "Fight #" counter that just goes up.
  • Dev time: ~5 days
  • Resoruces:
    • Sounds https://freesound.org/
    • Icons https://www.kenney.nl/
